snippet: COLAN--Robert. The lawyers at DLA Piper LLP (US) mourn the passing of Bob Colan, Vice President and Associate General Counsel in the Law Department of AXA Equitable Life Insurance Company. Bob was loyal, caring and professional, with a healthy sense of humor and a love of wine. Bob was abundantly fair and was renowned among real estate lawyers for his broad business and legal knowledge. We will miss him, and we wish his family, friends and colleagues the best. Frederick L. Klein DLA Piper LLP (US) Washington DC 1/3
lead_paragraph: COLAN--Robert. The lawyers at DLA Piper LLP (US) mourn the passing of Bob Colan, Vice President and Associate General Counsel in the Law Department of AXA Equitable Life Insurance Company. Bob was loyal, caring and professional, with a healthy sense of humor and a love of wine. Bob was abundantly fair and was renowned among real estate lawyers for his broad business and legal knowledge. We will miss him, and we wish his family, friends and colleagues the best. Frederick L. Klein DLA Piper LLP (US) Washington DC 1/3
